DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this clinical research study is to assess the bioequivalence of atazanavir administered as a single 300 mg capsule relative to two atazanavir 150 mg capsules in healthy subjects.
DOC.brief_title: Bioequivalence Study of Atazanavir 300 mg Capsule
DOC.criteria: Healthy male and female subjects between the ages of 18 to 50 years old with a body mass index (BMI) of 18 to 30 kg/mÂ² Prior to enrollment, subjects must have physical and laboratory test findings within normal limits, and women of childbearing potential (WOCBP) must have a negative pregnancy test.
